attributes.action: Instruct UKFI to veto bonuses in RBS
attributes.additional_details:
This petition asks that the government instructs UKFI to exercise its votes to block bonuses being paid to the directors of RBS

Irrespective of how good a job the directors may be doing, they are remunerated well enough.  Many elderly investors relied on dividend income from the bank and until a dividend can be declared, no bonuses in cash or shares are appropriate
